name: Lasry-Bullock Incline
description: The longest steady incline at Clark University. Low point is Lasry, high point is Bullock Hall

name: Goddard Hill
description: Low point is Dodd and Red Square, high point is Goddard Library

name: Bullock Elbow
description: Low point is Alden Quad, high point is Bullock Hall

name: Woodland Incline
description: Low point is Main St. intersection, high point is Atwood Hall

name: Charles Incline
description: Low point is Florence St. intersection, high point is Estabrook Hall
